s: The Drummer's Choice - Drum Workshop, Inc. is an American drum kit and hardware manufacturing company based in Oxnard, California.

4 weeks ago - Drum Workshop, Inc. (also known as DW Drums or DW) is a drum kit and hardware manufacturing company based in Oxnard, California. Current products by DW include drum sets, snare drums, and hardware. Drum Workshop was founded in 1972 as a teaching studio by Don Lombardi.

t: Drum Workshop, Inc. Company Profile | Oxnard, CA | Competitors, Financials & Contacts - Dun & Bradstreet
s: Drum Workshop (DW) can improve your paradiddle and your double pedal. The company designs and manufactures drums, pedals, hi-hats, and other hardware and accessories for musicians of many styles. It also sponsors clinics by professional drummers.

s: Founded in 1972, Drum Workshop has been a leading manufacturer of drums and drum hardware for over 40 years.
